Title: The Wrong Man
Writer: Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Nevin Densham, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (novel)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: After learning his sleeve's identity, Kovacs demands the full story from Ortega. A tip from Poe leads to a major breakthrough in the Bancroft case.
